description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the object. Often useful for displaying to users.

subtotal_cents.description: Gross price before any discount or tax is applied.

discount_cents.description: Current discount applied, if there is one.

discount_rate.description: Discount percent out of 100, if applicable.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product being invoiced.

product_code.description: The SKU of the Quaderno `Product` being invoiced. Use this attribute if you want to track your sales per product.

tax_1_name.description: Name of the tax, if applicable

tax_1_rate.description: Rate of the tax, if applicable

tax_1_region.description: Tax region, if applicable. Only for US sales tax and Canada GST.

tax_2_name.description: Additional name of the tax, if applicable

tax_2_rate.description: Additional rate of the tax, if applicable

tax_2_region.description: Additional tax region, if applicable. Only for US sales tax and Canada GST.

total_amount.description: The total amount to be charged after discounts and taxes. Required if `unit_price` is not passed.

unit_price.description: The unit price of the item before any discount or tax is applied. Required if `total_amount` is not passed.
